metadata.title: CVE-2021-20257 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An infinite loop flaw was found in the e1000 NIC emulator of the QEMU. Thisissue occurs while processing transmits (tx) descriptors in process_tx_descif various descriptor fields are initialized with invalid values. This flawallows a guest to consume CPU cycles on the host, resulting in a denial ofservice. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to systemavailability.

criterions.comment: qemu: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
